invocations.description: Iterates through projectiles shot in game, the values are stored in the variable p. For more information about a projectile, visit this.
invocations.ex:
auto(200)
foreach newprojectile p do
	if p.type == 32 and p.tox == $posx and p.toy == $posy then
		playsound('playerattacking.wav')
	end
end
invocations.exDescription: Will play an alert if someone shot a missile of the same type as the 'sudden death rune' at you.
